description: World leaders warn of resurgent hatred, 75 years after the Nazis' Auschwitz death camp was liberated.
title: Auschwitz 75 years on: Holocaust Day prompts new anti-Semitism warnings
title_page: Auschwitz 75 years on: Holocaust Day prompts new anti-Semitism warnings - BBC News
maintext: "We were coming closer and closer to the gas block and one of the Germans saw me. He looked at me and since I was a blonde baby with blue eyes he took me aside and told me I will survive. Thanks to that we survived. My mum says that thanks to the fact that I had a Nordic appearance, I saved her and myself."
